data.comment: The match is underway at Old Trafford.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Scott McTominay scores to make it 1-0 at Old Trafford.
Bruno Fernandes instrumental with a fine assist.
Anthony Taylor signals a Man Utd throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 3, Can Man Utd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leeds's half?
It's now 2-0 in Manchester as Scott McTominay scores for Man Utd.
That's a fine assist from Anthony Martial.
In the minute 5, Man Utd have a goal kick.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Throw-in for Man Utd in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 7, Man Utd drive forward but Daniel James is judged offside.
Patrick Bamford (Leeds) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In Manchester Leeds attack through Patrick Bamford. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 8, It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Marcus Rashford (Man Utd) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Man Utd close to the penalty box.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
Throw-in Man Utd.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, In Manchester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Leeds drive upfield and Rodrigo Moreno gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Man Utd defender.
Leeds's Patrick Bamford has run offside.
In the minute 20, Great finish from Bruno Fernandes to give Man Utd a 3-0 lead.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Free kick Man Utd.
In the minute 24, Anthony Taylor awards Leeds a goal kick.
Throw-in for Leeds at Old Trafford.
Patrick Bamford (Leeds) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Man Utd at Old Trafford.
Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in Manchester.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 28, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In Manchester Leeds's Raphinha is caught offside.
Important block from the Leeds defence as Daniel James fires in a strike for Man Utd.
In the minute 29, Raphinha (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Anthony Taylor awards Man Utd a goal kick.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Manchester, Ezgjan Alioski of Leeds is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 33, Anthony Taylor signals a throw-in for Leeds, close to Man Utd's area.
Man Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 34, Raphinha (Leeds) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Jack Harrison of Leeds is pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Goal! Man Utd extend their lead to 4-0 through Victor Lindelof.
Anthony Martial with an assist there.
In the minute 38, Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Anthony Taylor blows against Man Utd's Anthony Martial for offside.
In the minute 41, Leeds to take a throw-in in Man Utd territory.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Liam Cooper (Leeds) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 4-1.
In the minute 42, Great play from Raphinha to set up the goal.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Ezgjan Alioski (Leeds) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 43, Leeds's Raphinha is whistled for offside at Old Trafford.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Anthony Martial (Man Utd) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Man Utd's Marcus Rashford gets in a shot on goal at Old Trafford. But the effort is unsuccessful.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
In the minute 45, Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man Utd's half?
The first-half is over at Old Trafford.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Anthony Taylor signals a Man Utd throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 46, Pascal Struijk is replacing Kalvin Phillips for Leeds at Old Trafford.
The away team replace Mateusz Klich with Jamie Shackleton.
In the minute 47, Anthony Martial for Man Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Leeds at Old Trafford.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Man Utd.
In the minute 49, Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
Raphinha gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leeds.
In the minute 51, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Man Utd's Daniel James has been booked in Manchester.
In the minute 54, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Bruno Fernandes (Man Utd) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In the minute 55, Man Utd surge into the attack at Old Trafford but Bruno Fernandes’s header is off-target.
Leeds push forward at Old Trafford and Stuart Dallas gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Man Utd defence.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Man Utd.
In the minute 57, Man Utd's Bruno Fernandes gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Man Utd's Fred gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 57, Leeds have a goal kick.
Anthony Taylor signals a Man Utd throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Man Utd.
In Manchester Man Utd drive forward through Anthony Martial. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
The home team have replaced Luke Shaw with Alex Telles. This is the first substitution made today by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer.
In the minute 62, Man Utd needs to be cautious. Leeds have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Man Utd in their own half.
In the minute 65, Leeds drives forward and Raphinha gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Daniel James puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 5-1.
In the minute 66, Scott McTominay with an assist there.
Can Man Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Liam Cooper for Leeds who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 68, Man Utd have been given a penalty...
It's now 6-1 to Man Utd as Bruno Fernandes scores from the spot.
Man Utd make their second substitution with Edinson Cavani replacing Marcus Rashford.
In the minute 71, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer is making the team's third substitution at Old Trafford with Donny van de Beek replacing Bruno Fernandes.
Throw-in for Leeds in the half of Man Utd.
Liam Cooper (Leeds) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Leif Davis.
In the minute 73, Anthony Martial for Man Utd drives towards goal at Old Trafford. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Man Utd to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Leeds are back in the match in Manchester. Stuart Dallas has scored to make it 6-2.
In the minute 73, That's a fine assist from Raphinha.
Free kick for Man Utd in their own half.
Leeds have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 77, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Leeds at Old Trafford.
In Manchester, Jack Harrison of Leeds is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
In the minute 81, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Luke Ayling's header is off-target for Leeds.
Ball goes out of play for a Man Utd goal kick.
In the minute 83, Man Utd to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Edinson Cavani gets his shot on target but fails to score for Man Utd.
Man Utd pushes forward through Daniel James, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 86, Man Utd's Alex Telles is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Harry Maguire (Man Utd) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Leeds defenders.
In the minute 87, Fred of Man Utd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Man Utd.
Anthony Martial (Man Utd) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 87, Goal kick for Leeds at Old Trafford.
Man Utd have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Leeds's Jack Harrison breaks free at Old Trafford. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Anthony Taylor awards Man Utd a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Man Utd's Edinson Cavani gets in a shot on goal at Old Trafford. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Leeds in the half of Man Utd.
Anthony Taylor signals a Leeds throw-in in Man Utd's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Manchester.
That's full-time at Old Trafford. The final score is 6-2.
Attention is being given to Man Utd’s Scott McTominay and play has been suspended briefly.
